group_1.textCenter: With five wins to three losses...the winner@of the crane game duel is...

group_1.textLeft: I mean, it was pretty obvious this is how things@would go, yeah?
*Giggle*

group_1.textRight: Told you I'd never lose at a crane game.
You see now that you're a total scrub, eh,@Rena?

group_1.textLeft: And since you lost, that means that@you owe us drinks~

group_1.textCenter: Oh wow, the Futatsugi duo are REALLY out@for blood!
Rena Minami and Kaede Akino's gamer pride@is in SHAMBLES!
How will our two losers respond?!
Their fighting spirit is DEAD!@They have nothing left but their tears!
My personal magic always causes trouble@when I'm going live...
Sorry about that!@I'll be signing off now!
Jeez, what'd she have to do that for…?@It's her fault things got so intense…

group_1.textRight: Rena and Kaede were so close to winning, too...

group_1.textLeft: We don't need you guys comforting us@just because we lost.
Still, we both trained so hard together...@It's frustrating.

group_1.textRight: But you didn't have to go to such lengths@to fight people from Futatsugi.
I mean, we went through so much in order@to make peace...

group_1.textLeft: Huh? Don'tcha get it?@We ain't fighting, we're playing!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, you're taking this way too seriously.@What, you think we hate each other?
Trash talk is just part of the fun.

group_1.textLeft: We're just happy we can hang out without@worrying about factions and stuff.

group_1.textRight: So you're saying you weren't serious@about any of that?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, except the part where you buy us drinks.

group_1.textRight: [chara:100901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Excuse me?!

group_1.textCenter: So Yuna and Hikaru are busy with@the student council...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, Yuna threw all her focus on Promised Blood@for long time,
so it sounds like she and Hikaru got a lot@of work to catch up on.

group_1.textRight: I doubt Hikaru can take Sakuya's place...

group_1.textLeft: W-we still gotta root for her, okay?
Speaking of your friends, where's Juri?@Is she busy with Ryugasaki?

group_1.textRight: Of course not. She's just slouching around@reading comics.
Oh, hey, speak of the devil...

group_1.textLeft: What's up?

group_1.textRight: Oh shit, she's SO pissed we didn't invite her@to join our team...

group_1.textLeft: Aw jeez...@We're really in for it when we get back...
Alright, looks like everyone's here,@so let's get in line and order.

group_1.textRight: Kaede and I will pay for Ranka and Ao's drinks...
[chara:101101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What? I'm paying too?!

group_1.textLeft: Well, yeah.
We're a team, so you can't leave me@hung out to dry.

group_1.textRight: Ugh…

group_1.textLeft: Oh?

group_1.textRight: O-our former enemies, all together!
That's just what I was thinking.

group_1.textLeft: Are you here with the Feathers, too?@It's rare to see you guys in Kamihama.

group_1.textRight: By total coincidence, the Princess had things@to do here today.

group_1.textLeft: And we were pursuing a Witch's signature@and ended up in Kamihama.
We're rewarding the Feathers for their hard@work in defeating the Witch.

group_1.textRight: Seeing Lady San at her sweetest and sternest@is the best of both worlds... I'm so blessed...[a]

group_1.textLeft: So those guys get to be here as a reward...@and we're here for punishment...

group_1.textRight: Everyone's all here together, but we're@the only ones who are miserable...

group_1.textLeft: Ahaha...
